Item.name: Connoisseur
Item.description: Once per turn, you can change your direction to any other direction available during any phase except Movement Phase. You have N uses.

Item.name: Cured
Item.description: You cannot receive any negative status effect and lose the ones you have.

Item.name: Flying
Item.description: You cannot be attacked by normal attacks and your movement does not count as stepping.
Item.troubleshooting: cannot pass through illegal zones for this Character (Ex. Viking cannot step Radioactive Zones). Can still be affected by abilities or effects that are not attacks (Ex. Paralysis, Slowness, etc).
